website_summaries.verdict: Don't discount this double broiler just because you may not recognize the brand, as it has some nice features for a reasonable price.
pros: Decent price point for a stainless steel 2.5-quart double boiler
Has contoured handles that are easy to grip
Food doesn't tend to stick, making cleanup a breeze
cons: Metal isn't quite as thick as that of pricier options
A bit top-heavy when preparing some foods – watch out for tipping
